comment._content: The chap to the right of David Carment (ie. viewer's right) looks a bit like Fred Young www.flickr.com/photos/33147718@N05/8504687311/in/photolis... ; I think we also see him here www.flickr.com/photos/33147718@N05/8052291422/in/photolis... ; not quite so sure now (!) www.flickr.com/photos/33147718@N05/8492772103/in/photolis... ; ? is David Shallard Carment sitting 2nd from viewer's right in this pic? www.flickr.com/photos/33147718@N05/8492749467/in/photolis...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] He looks a bit like him but he doesn't have that same distinctive nose, the squint is similar though. Unfortunately that isn't David Shallard Carment either. I'm sure he'll turn up in more yachties pics though you can pretty much count on it  :)
